attributes.action: offer all catholic authored property back to The Holy Catholic Church.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many buildings, grounds, and historical artefacts that were created by the Catholic church and its followers such as: Westminster Cathedral, Glasgow Cathedral and Durham Cathedral are currently still under the unjust  ownership of the church of England due to the effects of the reformation.

The catholic church created and maintained these historic artefacts for centuries before other Christian denominations in Britain were thought of let alone established. They were sized and stolen from us.

Thus we ask the Prime Minster  to offer these back to The Catholic Church or work towards such an offer.
